attributes.action: Cpt Tom Moore to receive an MBE,OBE or a Knighthood for  serving the country.
attributes.background: The people of the UK should give Captain Tom Moore an honour. He should be included on this years honours list to receive an MBE OBE or a Knighthood for raising so much money for the NHS and serving the country.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
